output.sentences: We thought a boat tour of the city would be interesting and informational.
The building with the smokestack on top has been part of this city for more than one hundred years.
I didn't realize what an engineering feat this bridge was at the time it was built.
This picture gives a better idea of the size of the bridge and amount of metalwork done to make it.
This is looking back down the river at the bridge and the old factory section of town.
